verses.verse: And <WG2532> I <WG1473>, brethren <WG80>, could <WG1410> <WG5675> not <WG3756> speak <WG2980> <WG5658> unto you <WG5213> as <WG5613> unto spiritual <WG4152>, but <WG235> as <WG5613> unto carnal <WG4559>, even as <WG5613> unto babes <WG3516> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547>.

I have fed <WG4222> <WG5656> you <WG5209> with milk <WG1051>, and <WG2532> not <WG3756> with meat <WG1033>: for <WG1063> hitherto <WG3768> ye were <WG1410> not <WG3768> able <WG1410> <WG5711> to bear it, neither <WG235> <WG3777> yet <WG2089> now <WG3568> are ye able <WG1410> <WG5736>.

For <WG1063> ye are <WG2075> <WG5748> yet <WG2089> carnal <WG4559>: for <WG1063> whereas <WG3699> there is among <WG1722> you <WG5213> envying <WG2205>, and <WG2532> strife <WG2054>, and <WG2532> divisions <WG1370>, are ye <WG2075> <WG5748> not <WG3780> carnal <WG4559>, and <WG2532> walk <WG4043> <WG5719> as <WG2596> men <WG444>?

For <WG1063> while <WG3752> one <WG5100> saith <WG3004> <WG5725>, I <WG1473> <WG3303> am <WG1510> <WG5748> of SHa'ul <WG3972>; and <WG1161> another <WG2087>, I <WG1473> am of Apollos <WG625>; are <WG2075> ye <WG5748> not <WG3780> carnal <WG4559>?

Who <WG5101> then <WG3767> is <WG2076> <WG5748> SHa'ul <WG3972>, and <WG1161> who <WG5101> is Apollos <WG625>, but <WG235> <WG2228> ministers <WG1249> by <WG1223> whom <WG3739> ye believed <WG4100> <WG5656>, even <WG2532> as <WG5613> the YY <WG2962> gave <WG1325> <WG5656> to every man <WG1538>?
I <WG1473> have planted <WG5452> <WG5656>, Apollos <WG625> watered <WG4222> <WG5656>; but <WG235> 'Elohim <WG2316> gave the increase <WG837> <WG5707>.

So <WG5620> then neither <WG3777> is <WG2076> <WG5748> he that planteth <WG5452> <WG5723> any thing <WG5100>, neither <WG3777> he that watereth <WG4222> <WG5723>; but <WG235> 'Elohim <WG2316> that giveth the increase <WG837> <WG5723>.

Now <WG1161> he that planteth <WG5452> <WG5723> and <WG2532> he that watereth <WG4222> <WG5723> are <WG1526> <WG5748> one <WG1520>: and <WG1161> every man <WG1538> shall receive <WG2983> <WG5695> his own <WG2398> reward <WG3408> according <WG2596> to his own <WG2398> labour <WG2873>.
For <WG1063> we are <WG2070> <WG5748> labourers together <WG4904> with 'Elohim <WG2316>: ye are <WG2075> <WG5748> 'Elohim's <WG2316> husbandry <WG1091>, ye are 'Elohim's <WG2316> building <WG3619>.

According <WG2596> to the grace <WG5485> of 'Elohim <WG2316> which <WG3588> is given <WG1325> <WG5685> unto me <WG3427>, as <WG5613> a wise <WG4680> masterbuilder <WG753>, I have laid <WG5087> <WG5758> the foundation <WG2310>, and <WG1161> another <WG243> buildeth <WG2026> <WG5719> thereon. But <WG1161> let <WG991> every man <WG1538> take heed <WG991> <WG5720> how <WG4459> he buildeth <WG2026> <WG5719> thereupon.

For <WG1063> other <WG243> foundation <WG2310> can <WG1410> <WG5736> no man <WG3762> lay <WG5087> <WG5629> than <WG3844> that is laid <WG2749> <WG5740>, which <WG3739> is <WG2076> <WG5748> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>.

Now <WG1161> if any man <WG1536> build <WG2026> <WG5719> upon <WG1909> this <WG5126> foundation <WG2310> gold <WG5557>, silver <WG696>, precious <WG5093> stones <WG3037>, wood <WG3586>, hay <WG5528>, stubble <WG2562>;

Havahry man's <WG1538> work <WG2041> shall be made <WG1096> <WG5695> manifest <WG5318>: for <WG1063> the day <WG2250> shall declare <WG1213> <WG5692> it, because <WG3754> it shall be revealed <WG601> <WG5743> by <WG1722> fire <WG4442>; and <WG2532> the fire <WG4442> shall try <WG1381> <WG5692> every man's <WG1538> work <WG2041> of what sort <WG3697> it is <WG2076> <WG5748>.
If any man's <WG1536> work <WG2041> abide <WG3306> <WG5719> which <WG3739> he hath built <WG2026> <WG5656> thereupon, he shall receive <WG2983> <WG5695> a reward <WG3408>.

If any man's <WG1536> work <WG2041> shall be burned <WG2618> <WG5691>, he shall suffer loss <WG2210> <WG5701>: but <WG1161> he himself <WG846> shall be saved <WG4982> <WG5701>; yet <WG1161> so <WG3779> as <WG5613> by <WG1223> fire <WG4442>.

Know ye <WG1492> <WG5758> not <WG3756> that <WG3754> ye are <WG2075> <WG5748> the temple <WG3485> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, and <WG2532> that the Spirit <WG4151> of 'Elohim <WG2316> dwelleth <WG3611> <WG5719> in <WG1722> you <WG5213>?

If any man <WG1536> defile <WG5351> <WG5719> the temple <WG3485> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, him <WG5126> shall <WG5351> 'Elohim <WG2316> destroy <WG5351> <WG5692>; for <WG1063> the temple <WG3485> of 'Elohim <WG2316> is <WG2076> <WG5748> holy <WG40>, which <WG3748> temple ye <WG5210> are <WG2075> <WG5748>.

Let <WG1818> no man <WG3367> deceive <WG1818> <WG5720> himself <WG1438>. If any man <WG1536> among <WG1722> you <WG5213> seemeth <WG1380> <WG5719> to be <WG1511> <WG5750> wise <WG4680> in <WG1722> this <WG5129> world <WG165>, let him become <WG1096> <WG5634> a fool <WG3474>, that <WG2443> he may be <WG1096> <WG5638> wise <WG4680>.

For <WG1063> the wisdom <WG4678> of this <WG5127> world <WG2889> is <WG2076> <WG5748> foolishness <WG3472> with <WG3844> 'Elohim <WG2316>. For <WG1063> it is written <WG1125> <WG5769>, He taketh <WG1405> <WG5740> the wise <WG4680> in <WG1722> their own <WG846> craftiness <WG3834>.
And <WG2532> again <WG3825>, The YY <WG2962> knoweth <WG1097> <WG5719> the thoughts <WG1261> of the wise <WG4680>, that <WG3754> they are <WG1526> <WG5748> vain <WG3152>.
Therefore <WG5620> let <WG2744> no man <WG3367> glory <WG2744> <WG5737> in <WG1722> men <WG444>. For <WG1063> all things <WG3956> are <WG2076> <WG5748> yours <WG5216>;

Whether <WG1535> SHa'ul <WG3972>, or <WG1535> Apollos <WG625>, or <WG1535> Kefa <WG2786>, or <WG1535> the world <WG2889>, or <WG1535> life <WG2222>, or <WG1535> death <WG2288>, or <WG1535> things present <WG1764> <WG5761>, or <WG1535> things to come <WG3195> <WG5723>; all <WG3956> are <WG2076> <WG5748> yours <WG5216>;
And <WG1161> ye <WG5210> are Moshiach's <WG5547>; and <WG1161> Moshiach <WG5547> is 'Elohim's <WG2316>.
